word_mean: 脯氨酸：一种氨基酸，由Fischer于1901年发现，是胶原的主要成分。见tropocollagen

sentence.Network_en: It also contains high concentrations of proline and hydroxyproline.
sentence.Network_cn: 它还含有高浓度的脯氨酸和羟脯氨酸.

sentence.Network_en: It incorporated proline directly, and hydroxylated It'subsequently in a manner reminiscent of collagen.
sentence.Network_cn: 它直接将脯氨酸并入, 并且随后象骨胶那样使它羟基化.

sentence.Network_en: Proline has been found in every protein studied to date.
sentence.Network_cn: 脯氨酸在至今发现的每种蛋白质中均有存在.
